# f5distributedcloud_fast_acl_rule (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_fast_acl_rule` resource manages Fast ACL Rules in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Fast ACL Rules define individual access control entries.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_fast_acl_rule" "example" {
  name      = "example-fast-acl-rule"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
